name: bo thuston
text: NEVER SHOWED UP OR EVEN CALLED ! Elizabeth was very friendly on the phone and gave me details about their work. But she and Josh (who she said was coming with her ) never showed up on Tuesday 5/11/21 at 9 am for their appointment. And still have not showed up or called or texted. Have not return my texts (3) or phone calls (2). The job was going to be 1-4 townhouses needing gutter repair and gutter guards My advice is to be careful relying on these two  -  they must have plenty of work. And I 'sugar-coated' this review compared to their reviews from other customers.

resp.text: Yes, we are very busy. However, we are very sorry that the appointment fell through the cracks yesterday. If you are still interested, please call or email (jandeservicesal@gmail.com). The phone number for the business, unfortunately, does not receive text messages.

name: John Gasser
text: AVOID these scoundrels. They installed gutter screens for me. The work was poor to unacceptable. It took several calls to get them to come back and remediate the job. Then I noticed one of the gutters they put up was sagging in the middle preventing the water from draining. I called Josh the owner I believe. He said to send pictures which I did and have a confirmation of receipt. When I tried to call him to confirm receipt he had blocked my number. The next day I called him from a different number he answered and said he did not get the pictures which I had confirmation of his receiving. I told him I would resend them. He told me his salesman Brandon would call me ASAP. I am still waiting for Brandon's call. There are many good honest companies doing gutter guard work. Why deal with dishonest unprofessional people like J&E. AVOID them like the Corona virus.

name: Lael Gore
text: Several issues initially...but this company followed up and completed the job to my satisfaction. I recommend and will use them again when needed.

name: Cheryl Brewer
text: Gutters were not installed properly,  but the owner Josh quickly corrected to my satisfaction.

name: Joseph Greer
text: Fast, great work, great price

name: Dennis Swancoat
text: Had them come out to repair gutter it still leaked so called back to have it fixed they said when I finally got a response after about a week they would be here next day haven't heard from them since and it's been another week?

name: Morgan Ogilvie
text: David, Blake and their team are absolutely fantastic. They did a great job installing our new roof in a very timely manner. They were very easy to work with and provided top notch service throughout the entire process. Could not more highly recommend.

resp.text:
Morgan,
Thank you for the nice review. It was a pleasure getting to know you and your wife, and helping you with your roofing needs. Congratulations on that new and beautiful house.
DG.

name: Gloria McGee
text: I contacted David at DynoDry Roofing and Construction for an estimate on a full roof replacement. He came to my home and assessed my roof and provided an estimate with an affordable and reasonable price.  He provided the date and time the crew would come out to begin the work and had the materials delivered to my home the day before the start date. The crew arrived promptly at the time he advised and the roof work was completed on the same day. The new roof and the clean up performed after completion of the job were immaculate.  David is friendly, straightforward, extremely knowledgeable, and very professional. I would highly recommend that anyone in need of roof work contact David at DynoDry Roofing and Construction to have the work needed assessed and completed in a timely, efficient, and professional manner at a fair and reasonable cost.

resp.text:
Ms. McGee,
Thank you for the feedback and review.
It was a pleasure working with you to replace your roof. The style and color you chose look great on your house.
We at DynoDry Roofing & Construction Services look forward to working with you on your future home improvement projects.

name: Julia Bruce
text: David and crew did a great job and the roof looks great.  Very easy to work with.  Would definitely work with them again!

resp.text:
Julia,
Thank you for the kind review.
We look forward to working with you in the future on your next home improvement project.
Congratulations on your new home.

name: Lynn Crawford
text: I had an unexpected leak during a rainstorm.  David was very responsive and was able to get to my house the next day and make sure that everything was covered and waterproof.  After the work was completed, he came back several times to make sure everything was done perfectly and to ease my anxiety about water.  I highly recommend them for any of their services.

resp.text:
Dr. Crawford,
Thank you for the kind words and the 5 star review. It was nice meeting and working with you on your house to resolve your water intrusion issues.
The new roof, gutters and soffit renovations look great on your home. Nice job on your color choices!

name: Savanna Marion
text: Wonderful team! We love our new roof and the value it brings to our home. Very professional and easy to work with!

resp.text:
Savanna,
Thank you for the kind words, the 5 star review and trusting DynoDry Roofing & Construction Services to replace your roof.

name: Judith Carter
text: Outstanding service and workmanship.  Accurate estimate, on time delivery, maintained a clean and safe work place.  Professional roofing at its best.

resp.text:
Ms. Carter,
Thank you for the kind review. We at DynoDry Roofing & Construction Services appreciate your business. It was a pleasure working with and getting to know you and Mr. Carter.
God Bless you both!

name: Allan Casteel
text: The workers at Dynodry were very professional. They were excellent at keeping the site clean while they performed the work. I would use them again for sure.

resp.text:
Mr. Casteel,
Thank you for the nice review. Your project was certainly unique in that we had to get it done despite COVID restrictions and the delays it caused in getting some of the non-stocked materials. Our goal at DynoDry Roofing & Construction Services is always 100% customer satisfaction, regardless of the project challenges.
Thanks again and congratulations on selling your house.

name: Courtney Waldron
text: Happy to recommend David and his crew. They did a major project on our home and it turned out beautifully. He communicated with us throughout the project and his guys were always on time...every day! We so appreciate that. They also made sure our pool and lawn were protected throughout the project. Very happy with their work!

name: Lee Moradi
text: I highly recommend DynoDry for roofing and gutter work!  David Grill is very honest and takes time to answer questions.  He was very helpful to us and had several roofing samples for us to pick from.  His workers were kind and professional and put up our roof quickly with no mess.  There has been a lot of rain since the new roof was put on the house and we have seen no problems.  Our roof looks great and we couldn't be happier!

name: Janat Sapp
text: We highly recommend DynoDry for roofing!  David Grill is very thorough and answered all of our questions.  He was very helpful to us and had several samples attached to our roof so that we could pick out the color that looks the best.  His workers were kind and professional and put up our roof quickly with no mess.  Our roof looks great and we couldn't be happier!

resp.text:
Thank you for the kind words Ms. Sapp.
That GAF Timberline HD shingle, in the Weathered Wood color you chose, looks great on your house.
You guys were a pleasure to work with on this project.

name: Janet Fred
text: It is really hard to explain how more than pleased we were to meet and use the services of DynoDry. David, the owner, came and met my 90 year old Mother and discussed the process of reroofing her house after storm damage. There was damage from leaks and he had his subcontractors come out and explain the process and give us a price. They were so kind and hard working and totally trustworthy. We have owned many homes over the years and have never had such a good feeling when a project was complete, truly thankful to have had such an honorable man and a wonderful company to do the work we needed at a very fair price. We would recommend them highly, and have already done so.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Ms. Fred. It was a pleasure meeting your family and working with all of you to make all the necessary roof and interior water damage repairs at your home.

name: Brian Screws
text: Very happy with the work by the guys at DynoDry. I worked 1-on-1 with David (the owner) through the entire process of replacing my roof and repairing some water damage inside and outside of my home. David is extremely knowledgeable about his trade and answered any possible question that I could throw at him. Highly recommended.

resp.text:
Brian,
Thank you for the kind words and compliments. It is always our goal to do excellent work and communication with our customers is key throughout the project.

name: Karen Reeves
text: DynoDry provided mold removal in our master bath. We had black mold and could not complete our remodel until the mold and drying was completed. DynoDry did a great job in meeting our needs. They were prompt and extremely professional. I would recommend DynoDry to anyone needing their services.

name: Sarah Howard
text: David was very helpful as we navigated the insurance claim process and his team was fast and efficient with replacing our roof. We are very happy with the end result.

resp.text:
Sarah,
Thank you for the compliments.
It was great working with you and your lovely family.
Also, it's always a pleasure to help with active military families. Again, thank you and your husband for his service to our country.

name: David Harcourt
text:
Not quiet finished as yet , but if last 5% is as good as the first, I will be well satisfied.
On time, quality work ,and on budget.
The owner , David, suggested an upgraded shingle that we like very well. Worth the extra cost.

name: David Whitehurst
text: David and DynoDry responded immediately when we had a high pressure water line break at my office. They jumped right on getting the water out and then dried everything over just a few days. This helped avoid the moisture turning to mold inside the walls and ceiling. They also handled the repairs very professionally after getting us dried out. I highly recommend them.

name: Mike Whitaker
text: We were very pleased with the competitive pricing and professional work. We have received many compliments on our new roof. The new ridge vents should also result in lower energy cost.

name: Henry Raymond
text: They did a great job. Keep the site clean and keep us informed as progress was made.

resp.text:
Henry,
Thank you for feedback on the re-roof project we did at The First Presbyterian Church of Alabaster.  It was a pleasure working with everyone there on the building committee to get this project completed.  Also, we were grateful to be chosen to do the work on such an iconic, landmark Alabaster church.

name: Sullivan Edwards (Sully)
text:
Abraham and his crew were professional, courteous, and performed everything that I expected, while keeping me informed if anything unexpected came up.

They fixed some major drainage and erosion issues in the back yard (see before and after photos) by burying downspouts, building a French drain that went out to the road, and tying the downspouts into the drain. It is super satisfying to watch tons of water just pouring out of the drain into the street after a heavy rain.

They also graded and re-sodded the yard with Zoysia for less than it would have cost me to personally buy the Zoysia and lay the sod myself. I highly recommend Legacy for your personal landscaping project.

resp.text: Mr. Edwards,  We would like to take the opportunity to thank you so very much for the positive review.  Abraham enjoyed working on your drainage project and we are truly blessed to have such great people working with us to help solve issues that our customers may be having.  Have a great summer!

name: Rene' Holt
text: I never like to leave bad reviews and always try to keep them positive, but I contacted this company to help with some backyard design and remodel. I had a meeting scheduled with Jacob this past Wednesday and when he was 30 minutes late, I called the office to make sure nothing was wrong. Jacob called back and offered no apology for being a no-show but we rescheduled for today. It's a hour last our appointment time and he didn't show up again with no call and didn't answer his phone. If you can't be professional enough to keep scheduled appointments, twice, you're not a company I want to work with.

resp.text: Rene', thank you so very much for letting us know about the appointment issues.  This rarely happens, let alone 2 times.  Jacob inadvertently kept the same time from last week's appointment on his calendar and received a notice this morning that you cancelled the appointment, assuming it was this afternoon.  We regret that we were not able to be of assistance with your backyard project and appreciate again the review so that we can strive to do better, even in such a crazy year!    Tami

name: Neva Turner
text:
Our experience with Legacy truly deserves 10 stars. From first contact they have been the best company we have ever worked with. Everything was done timely and professionally. Quality is top notch. They have shown quality of work ethic beyond measure. We highly recommend this company. During this difficult time with Covid 19, working with everyone at Legacy has been inspiring and uplifting.
Great company !!

resp.text: Neva, getting to know you and your husband has been one of the highlights of our year.  You are such a pleasure to work for and your appreciation and kindness have not gone unnoticed.  The crew always enjoys working with you on your projects and we look forward to seeing what else you may have in store for your beautiful home!

name: Heather Meacham
text: Paul and Tami are so great to work with.  They pay attention to every detail and our patio is just perfect.  Very professional!!!

resp.text: Heather, it was such a pleasure to work with you on your patio project.  I absolutely love the color of the concrete,  it was an excellent choice.  Thank you again and enjoy your new patio!

name: Jason Comfort
text:
First let me say that my wife and I are extremely pleased with the work.  More importantly, Abraham and his crew were phenomenal.  They were cognizant of the fact that my neighbors and I are all working from home and kept the noise at a minimum.  They went out of their way not to leave a mess after the first day after asking what our HOA restrictions were.  When they were finished, they had filled in the large hole my dogs had dug and placed down a few pieces of sod to cover some bare spots.  Truly outstanding service.

Lastly, when they were finished, and before they left, your team saw one of my neighbors struggling to unload a trailer.  They offered to help unload the heavy item for him.  They were truly great ambassadors for the company.

We have some pretty grand plans for our back yard that will stretch over the next couple of years.  After this experience, I guarantee that we will be reaching back out to Legacy Outdoor Services.

resp.text: Jason, Thank you ever so much for the review!  Your patience as we worked on your project was very much appreciated as the wet weather  makes drainage work even more challenging.  We are very blessed to have great teams working with us and we can't wait to see what else you have in store for your home.  Have a great summer@

name: debi frankowski
text:
We are so pleased with the work that Legacy Outdoor Services just completed at our house.  They installed and sculpted the most beautiful waterfall feature in our mountainside back yard, along with up-lighting that really looks awesome in the evening.  Additionally, they put in a flagstone patio with a gas fire pit, with beautiful natural landscape features and mulch beds all around.  We have had many compliments on it, and it is surprisingly low maintenance too!  We just love it!
We had several unforeseen complications which were out of Legacy's control, related to our gas line installation and inspection,  that Legacy patiently and proactively worked through.  We appreciated their high level of customer service and commitment, and will certainly use them again in the future!

resp.text: Debi, We absolutely loved working with you both!  You have such a nice home and we were so happy to be able to help you design an outdoor living area that accented your already existing hillside.  You have been so very patient as we worked towards getting your gas issue resolved.  Now you can sit back and enjoy all the elements together that make for a very relaxing getaway!

name: Jacquelyn Pletcher
text:
Make sure your quote is EXTREMELY detailed, and that you’re home and watching every step they take for quotes involving construction. Otherwise you’ll end up with new concrete that is uneven (that will forever pool water TOWARDS your home), concrete paint that is already permanently stained with mud BEFORE they leave/finish, deep tracks in your sod because they will drive a concrete truck in your backyard, ground/grass that isn’t graded back the way it was before construction and therefore leaving extremely uneven muddy hills all over your yard, nails and cigarettes in your yard WEEKS after they leave, and a final structure that is uneven, sealed poorly, with paint drips that have dried.

Would not refer.

resp.text: Jacquelyn,  We just wanted to thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to leave us a review.  It is always important for a business to strive to grow in their professionalism and communication skills.  That growth is hindered if someone does not express their concerns that arise during and after a project.  Thank you again!

name: Aurora Marmolejo
text: I had some pavers placed around my back screen porch and a flower bedding put in front of my home. They did awesome work always done within two days and they cleaned the area really good. I highly recommend Legacy outdoor services.

resp.text:
Aurora, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review!  The crews commented on how very kind you were to them while they were working and that means a lot.  We are excited for you to be able to use your new space and look forward to helping you in the future!
Tami

name: Susan Tuck
text: We hired Legacy Outdoor Services for a drainage issue.  We quoted several other companies as well.  Not only did Legacy provide a detailed quote with the scope of work to be performed it was very priced very competitively.  The entire staff is to be commended.  I was kept informed as to when the job would be started without having to follow up.  When the crew arrived they were well prepared and ready to work.  This is by far the best crew I have seen.  They worked extremely well as a team.  This was a messy job to say the least.  The clean up was amazing.  When they left you couldn’t even tell they had been there!  I would highly recommend Legacy for your outdoor needs.

resp.text: Susan, thank you ever so much for the positive feedback.  We appreciate greatly the opportunity to help you with your drainage issues and we are glad that we were able to meet your expectations!

name: Madeline Ortiz
text: Great experience, really pleased with the result Good communication and work complete on time. Definitely will do business again. Highly recommend this business

resp.text: Madeline,  thank you so very much for the positive review.  It was such a pleasure to meet with you and to design a landscape you can enjoy for many years to come!

name: Diane Cooper
text: Legacy Outdoor helped me get a couple of trees planted in my bare back yard.  They look nice and the hummingbirds are already checking the Japanese Maple out.  Tammy and I worked together to find the perfect trees, exactly what I wanted.

resp.text: Diane, you have been so great to work with over the past several years.  We appreciate the opportunity to help you with new projects and look forward to many more in the future.  Thanks again!

name: J M
text: My yard is really uneven in places after having new sod laid and the length of time for them to get my project done is what gives them three stars. Otherwise, they did a good job.

resp.text: Your feedback is greatly appreciated!  This year has been rather frustrating as covid, weather, and supply issues have caused delays that we have not had to deal with in the past.  Nonetheless, we are grateful for your patience and we wish you a safe and healthy rest of the year.

name: JB Robins
text: Legacy Outdoor Services did a most beautiful job landscaping my front yard.  They installed a stone border around my flower beds and perfectly matched the stone with the stone on my house.  They added so much color to my yard with yellow, red and green shrubs and added even more color with flowers.  It is outstanding and I am extremely pleased.  The landscape workers are very professional and polite.  They were always on time and did what they promised each day.  The owner, Tami, came by most days to ensure that I was happy with the way the job was going.  They are very flexible and allowed me to do add-ons as we progressed.  I plan to re-landscape the back yard next and I will be using Legacy.  Their work is excellent!!!!

resp.text: Ms. Jan, thank you so very much for the great review!  We very much enjoyed helping you with your landscape project and we can't wait to see what new ideas you will have for us in the future!

name: Patrick Miller
text: We are very happy with the work that was done. Owners and workers were extremely professional and courteous. Work was done on time and within budget. We can highly recommend this company.

resp.text: Patrick,  it was such a wonderful experience to work with you and your wife on this project.  To be able to add more outdoor area for you to enjoy while adding a functional walkway was our goal.  It was rather hot and your attention to our crew was appreciated.  Again, thank you for your review.

name: Joy Fitzpatrick
text: Loved working with Legacy on my landscaping and hardscaping.  They have a lot of creative ideas and deliver as promised. Their employees were respectful and pleasant to work with. I'll be contacting them again when I install a pergola and some additional projects.

resp.text: Joy,  Thank you so much for the encouraging review!  You had such great ideas that were not like most cookie cutter landscapes you might see.  It was so much fun finding unique plants and I have to admit there are more "tropical" options for this area than I thought.  You are great to work with and I hope that we have the opportunity to help you again in the future.

name: Carol Johnson
text:
We chose Legacy Outdoor Services to implement the first phase of a multi-year landscape plan for our new house. It was an excellent experience all around and we are very, very pleased with the results. Everyone there is a pleasure to work with. Paul walked through the project with us when he did our estimate, and proposed several changes to our designer’s plan that were improved solutions to fix our yard’s drainage challenges. Jessica, the office manager, was always responsive to questions, and Tami did a great job hunting down the plants we selected — which wasn’t that easy in September. When they couldn’t find the specific plants on our plan, she collaborated with us to select acceptable substitutes.
Austin, our project manager, and his crew were wonderful. They are great guys, hard workers, and do an amazing job. Even the installation was a collaborative experience. Austin suggested an additional dry creek bed on the side of the yard to deal with the excess water that funnels into our yard from the neighbor’s driveway. We are looking forward to working with Legacy again next year when we install the next phase of our landscape plan!

resp.text:
Carol, you were such a pleasure to work with and everyone agreed that your design was just beautiful!
We can't wait to see what the next phase has in store.  Thank you again.

name: Dana Williams
text: I had drainage work done and these guys did great. Paul and his crew got on the work quickly and worked hard to complete the job through some very difficult conditions. Austin ran the crew and he was an expert at his work and went well beyond to finish a french drain, grading and downspout pipes to the street. Austin is a fine person to work with as well as his second in charge Abraham.

resp.text: Dana, thank you so very much for the encouraging words!  You are right, sometimes the wet weather makes drainage work rather challenging.  You were both so very patient and helpful during the whole process and we are so very thankful for the opportunity to help you with your drainage issues.

name: Joey Borders
text: If you need landscaping done give Legacy a call. They do all kinds of work, but we personally had hardscaping done. They came out, viewed our patio, designed a new layout, tweaked it a few times to get it within our budget, and completed the work. I even reached out to several other companies in the beginning stages. Legacy gave us the best design with the best cost. We worked with David the majority of the time. He and the company are professional. Extremely courteous and will answer any questions/concerns. Two thumbs up.

resp.text: Joey,  We absolutely loved your design, it was unique and functional for your family.  You were such a pleasure to work with and we appreciate the opportunity to help you with your hardscape project.  Have a great spring!

name: Diane Moore
text: Legacy Outdoor Services has a great team of people and are so easy to work with.  We hired them to do some ground prep work before we installed our above ground pool.  The workers were very courteous, polite, and always showed up on time.  We couldn’t have asked for a better job and highly recommend them!

resp.text: Diane, thank you ever so much for letting us know about your experience!  As always, it was a pleasure working with you and we look forward to more projects in the future!

name: Lisa
text: Legacy Outdoor Services is the only service of this type that I will use.  They have done multiple projects for me over the course of the last few years.  Their workers are always respectful and courteous. As a woman with workers on my property, that is very important to me.  They truly go the extra mile in making sure that I am completely satisfied with their work.  Whenever the opportunity arises, I am happy to recommend Legacy to anyone who needs work done, and I do so with the utmost confidence in the caliber of work that they will provide.

resp.text:
Ms. Lisa,
It has been the utmost pleasure to work with you on all of your projects.  Your ideas are unique and beautiful and it has been a wonderful experience bringing those ideas to life.  Customer relations is very important and we are so grateful for the opportunity to be involved in meeting your expectations.

name: Tami McGhee

name: Wes G Smith
text: I would not use this contractor again, nor would I recommend them to anyone else.  They did a drainage project for me where I explicitly described the design I wanted and it incorporated solid PVC pipe.  On the day of the job, the workers showed up with corrugated pipe.  When I called the owner, he stated that PVC would be $800 more, so feeling like I didn't want to start over with another contractor, I told him to go ahead.  Then I found out that a portion of the water to be drained to the street running from the downspout  was going through perforated corrugated pipe (pipe with holes).  They assured me that the water would be moving and would not leak out into already saturated ground (yeah, right).  Then I came home to find that the grate to catch water coming off the sidewalk was about 1 and a half to 2 inches away from the sidewalk, requiring the water to run over dirt before entering the grate.  The owner tried to tell me that it would be no problem and the bare dirt would not erode despite water constantly running over it.  I insisted that concrete be put between the sidewalk and grate to keep the water from washing out the dirt.  When I came home, I found they had used a type of caulk between the grate and the sidewalk, and had done a messy job of it, I don't know if that much caulk will ever cure.  After two days it is still soft.  Additionally, where they cut through the curb, the re-concreting was extremely poorly done.  It looked like they didn't even use a trowel, much less a curbing tool.  It looked like they basically packed the concrete on with their fingers and left it.  Part of the contract called for doing a brick border along the sidewalk.  After I paid them for the portion of the contract for the drainage, they informed me that they were waking away from the contract and that I needed to find someone else to do the edging.  The pity is, the subcontractor they had lined up to do the masonry work actually sounded very competent.  Bottom line, this is a company that, in my opinion, cut corners at every opportunity, poorly designed the project, provided shoddy workmanship, and then walked away with nearly half of the contracted work unperformed.

name: matt demuro
text:
This company gave me probably the worst experience that I have had with a company that has done work for me. I contracted with them to do drainage work, a sprinkler system and landscape lighting.

I was told this would take 3 weeks to complete, with each phase occurring on consecutive weeks. The project as a whole took almost 12 weeks to complete, and this was only because I hounded them with calls multiple times per week.

The drainage work was the first part, it seemed to be fine, though the French drain was not placed the complete length that was discussed originally. Also the fingers of river rich were put in to stop erosion, but almost no grass seed was put in afterwards, so nothing but weeds grew in between the river rock.

The second piece was the sprinkler system. This was put in during a day, but the ground was not backfilled properly and they needed to come back out to fix it. We were told that they would put down grass seed after the lighting job was completed. The lighting work was not completed for another 8 weeks, and there wasn’t any seed put down afterwards. They were also supposed to aerate and oversees the lawn, but since they could not get their mower into our backyard, they told us they would come back with a smaller mower to pull the aerator later. This never happened.

I had to call them 2-3 times a week for 8 weeks to get them to complete the lighting. Part of it was landscape lighting, the other portion was putting in a fan and spotlight in/on our screened patio. The wiring was placed so shallow, that it came out of the ground within a week and they had to come back to fix. The light and fan was supposed to be put in by an electrician, but was just put in by the owner and his friend. They put a cheap conduit over the electrical wire that didn’t even cover the wire.  They sent an electrician out to fix the wiring, but he just rigged another kind of conduit on the bare wire to cover it up.  The uplighting for the trees was sold to us at $65 a light. I just found the lights online for $45 for a 4-pack of lights.

We just gave up with this company and figured we would just be stuck with this work. Over the last year, I kept burying and covering up the wire as it came out of the ground and have been trying to repair the grass in the area where they did sprinkler and drainage work. We are still fighting massive weeds from the lack of follow through on planting grass after their work was completed.

I am writing this review today after I just finished replacing 3 lights that stopped working and half of the wiring that was put in for the landscape lights. Turns out they believe that wire nuts are not necessary and you only need to tape wires together with electrical tape before putting it in the ground.

If you are looking for a company to do landscaping work for you, stay very far away from this company. You will only be sorry if you choose them.

resp.text: Thank you for bringing all of this to our attention.  Unfortunately scheduling can be a challenge when dealing with different elements and sometimes issues arise.  For example the drainage was delayed due to an unmarked water pipe, flooding the drainage trenches.   The ceiling fan was installed by a certified electrician, as was the wiring for the fan, flood lights and outdoor switch.  We would be more than happy to provide the name of the electricians that provided these services.   The contract states that there is a year warranty covering defects in workmanship and materials.   Is regrettable that we did not have the opportunity to fix the issues that you were having with your lights, thus alleviating some of your frustration.  If we had only known of the issues we would have been more than happy to fulfill the contact’s one year warranty.  Again thank you for your comments and we will take them all into consideration to better our services.

text: I called Thompson Roofing and Construction for a leaky roof for my 2018 build home, not knowing that it was a fairly minor issue. I was ready to pay the charge for whatever needed to be done, but Jamie showed up, fixed my issues AND cleaned my gutters (I didn’t even request that) and they just requested that I think of them next time I had a roofing need! No expense to me! That shows me these guys are committed to building a solid customer base because of the confidence in their superior quality and customer service. Outstanding! text: Called Thompson Roofing for a client of mine and they were very responsive and punctual. Was able to explain to me and my client exactly what was needed to fix her roof and showed us pictures before and after everything was completed.  We were informed during the whole process and there was never a point where we both did not know what they were doing or when they were coming. I would highly recommend them to everyone!

name: Peter DEROCHEMONT
text: Outstanding and very professional job.  Extremely satisfied with finished product.  #1 in my book if needed again.

name: StevenElisa Allen
text: They were great from start to finish.  They came out the day I called to patch the roof and stop the leak.  They followed up each step of the way, making sure I was satisfied.  They even called after I paid, to make sure everything was still good.  This is how every business should be.  Use them.  You won’t regret it.

name: Les Lewis
text: Thompson Roofing provided a quality service at a reasonable price. Adam, who came out and performed the initial assessment was pleasant and professional. He arrived on time and performed a complete and thorough assessment of my roofing issues. Estimate was reasonable and the work was done within a few days. I'm really pleased with my experience and will use them again if the need arises.

name: Danny Quigley
text: After calling multiple companies for a quote, Thompson roofing was the only company to show up the day they said they were coming or even show up at all. Scott Shaw came out and was very honest and upfront with what we needed repaired. Anytime I had a question for Scott he was always quick to respond and just a great guy. Thompson Roofing did repairs on 2 roofs for us and would definitely call them again in the future.

name: Casey Hand
text: We had a great experience overall using Thompson roof! The only negatives were some damage was done in the process of getting some rotting wood replaced, not by Thompson roof but by the people they recommended. Love the outcome and can't believe how different the house looks with a better roof!

name: Justin Colar
text: We have just purchased a new home and unfortunately we have had some leaks that needed to be addressed. Thompson Roofing and Construction was put on the call to address our issues. Jamie did an excellent job in fixing our roof and was thorough in his explanations in what caused the leaks. I would recommend their services for all of your roofing needs.

name: Mark Unger
text: Great company to work with.  Great customer service!  Kyle insured the work was done to our satisfaction. We have had them do our roof along with other other projects. All results exceeded expectations. Keep up the great work.

name: Chuck Burch
text: We're relatively new to the area and the idea of replacing a roof that was probably 5 times larger than anything we had dealt with before was to say the least daunting.  So after we disposed of the "fly-by-night" guys (is there some unwritten rule that they all have to wear blue tooth head sets?) I asked around, got bids from 3 contractors and decided on Thompson - professional, price competitive, responsive - all the things I was looking for.  Immediately upon signing, I was given the nam of our  Project Manager and he held our hand guiding us throughout the lead-up and then the actual installation day.  I have never seen a crew so large yet so professional in my life and was impressed to say the least. 07h30 they were at the door and by 16h30 we had a beautiful new roof, the site was carefully "policed" for stray nails and other detritus and they were gone.  The next day Keith (our PM) came back to make sure things were done as he expected followed by our original "salesman" (that term is so inadequate) Kyle coming out the following day to walk the roof and the grounds and write up a final "punch list".  And within 24 hours we had been visited once again this time by a small set of the original crew who knocked out the punch list items in under and hour and then were gone again.  We are extremely pleased and would gladly recommend Thompson's to anyone else looking to replace a roof - large or small.  CB

name: Sandra Lyons
text: Very pleased with installation of my GAF Timberline HDZ roof by Thompson Roofing. They started as scheduled and were very professional. They cleaned up completely after the installation. Received GAF warranty afterwards as promised. I would certainly recommend to friends and family.

resp.text: It truly warms our hearts to look back at your wonderful review of our service to your family and your home. Thank you for sharing your experience with those that may be looking for a local, experienced roofing contractor and may consider our team here at Thompson Roofing and Construction. We hope this finds you and yours in the best of health and spirits and know we are here to service and stand by our workmanship if the need may ever arise. From all of us here, again, Thank You.

name: Miranda Murphy
text: I highly recommend Thompson roofing. Dustin (the owner) and Marcus (sales) have been involved in every step of the process with us. Marcus was extremely patient with us having some difficulties with our insurance company. They completed the work fast and thoroughly. We will continue using them in the future, when the need arises. I trust this company completely.

name: C
text: From the initial request for estimate to the final inspection, everyone I dealt with at Thompson Roofing was professional, respectful, great quality work and clean up, and every single person did what they said they would do, with no prompting or begging from me.  This was a great experience for me!  I would most definitely use Thompson Roofing again and recommend them with out hesitation.

name: Andrea Simpson
text: After months of trying to get help with my roof leak from various roofing contractors I was finally referred to Thompson Roofing. Several of these previous contractors would either, 1. never call back or failed to show up or 2. when they would come out I was being told over and over I needed a new roof. Thompson Roofing came when they said they would and fixed my leak in the concentrated area ONLY! I didn't need a whole new roof AND they were able to fix it in between all the rain.  They are truly a stand up company!

name: Pat Gatlin
text: Adam Lee was great to deal with. Easily explained work that was needed. The repairman was prompt and very polite. Work was completed in a timely manner and all trash was cleaned up afterward. I would definitely recommend Thompson Roofing.

name: DONALD KEY
text: I have been well pleased with the service of Thompson Roofing and Construction.  The sales representative Marcus Sanders was great to work with and the service was completed on time as scheduled.  The roofing materials were delivered as stated.  The roofing crew arrived at the time he said they would arrive.  I would highly recommend to anyone that need roofing service to contact Thompson Roofing and Construction.  You will be well pleases

name: L A
text: From start to finish it has been a displeasure working with the company. Scott and Jeremy were professional but the workmanship from this company wasn’t. I contacted them to repair vinyl and fascia as well in relation to the issues encountered from a previous company. They told me they didn’t need to remove he fascia because it was fine well a few months after the repairs the fascia now has problems after their repair was completed which appears to me that he repair needed was caused by their repair they made being cut too short. I had problems getting them to start due to internal issues that they were having with man power. After they finally came out they had to return more than once to fix what they were hired to do. I do not recommend this company at all and I do not recommend anyone use them. Their are better companies out there that will follow through and do what they say in a timely fashion and own up to any issues derived from a poor repair. Any previous decent reviews made should be disregarded. $3,924 for faulty repair. Save yourself the trouble.

name: Andrew Langefeld
text:
Thompson Roofing did a great job replacing my roof, and everyone was a pleasure to work with through the whole process. Scott Shaw explained the material and construction options available and answered all of my questions. A construction date was available shortly thereafter, less than three weeks later.

On the date of construction, the crew arrived and quickly had the roof stripped. They completed the new roof the same day with plenty of daylight to spare. They protected my yard and landscape and cleaned up everything. Scott did a follow-up inspection afterwards. The new roof looks great!

name: James Herring
text: I had roof leaks crop up on an 11 year old roof and had Thompson Roofing come out for an estimate.  The estimator checked in the attic as well as on the second story roof.  He provided pictures of damaged/suspect areas and described the proposed repairs.  I was impressed by his friendliness, knowledge, and overall approach.  The price was higher than a competitor (actually the original roof installer) but, based on a the info provided and contrasted with the plan of work proposed by the competitor, I was willing to pay the difference for peace of mind.   The one year warranty on workmanship also helped.  Unfortunately I wasn't available when the work was done, buy my wife said the repair tech set about his business and had it done in no time.  The original estimator visited after the work was finished (and after a good rain) to check for issues and quality of the job performed.  From initial proposal to final follow-up  I'd say we're quite satisfied with the work done by all.  I'd recommend Thompson for repairs or complete roof replacement.

name: Hillary Lenoir
text: Adam Lee, with Thompson Roofing, was very professional. He cake to our house and answered all of our questions and worked with us on our options to get just the perfect roof. The roofing crew delivered all materials before they started their work and when they came to work they worked until dark each night and cleaned up everything nicely after the job was completed! Adam came back after our roof was installed to make sure everything was installed properly and to make sure we were satisfied. Great company to work with for a new roof, friendly staff, and hard working roofers! They go the extra mile to make sure their customers are satisfied!

name: Kurt Knapp
text: Excellent and very professional service from estimate, determining options, upgrades, through installation and final inspection.  2 days to do 70 squares of roofing (tear off and replace).  Even corrected vent issues created by builder.  Crew was very professional and respectful of property.   They kept the area neat and did a complete cleanup before leaving.    This was my best experience with a contractor to date.  Flawless, painless, and excellent results.   The roof has never looked better.   Highly recommend.  Kyle from Thompson's Roofing is the professional to talk to if you need a new roof.

name: Kim Stiles
text: Thompson Roofing & Construction did a great job on my roof.  They answered my call within hours and was out to my house within a day.  As it is the rainy season it took several visits for them to estimate and repair the roof.  The young gentlemen came early in the morning and we visited for a few minutes to my questions, they went straight to work and were gone within a few hours.  The "Boss Man" called me the next day to make sure everything was OK and said they had found other repairs that needed taken care of which they did so everything was taken care of as we were having so much rain.  I can really recommend this company 100%  When it comes time in the future to replace my roof, this will be the company I call.  Or any repairs!!

name: Barry Britnell
text: Fantastic job by everyone on the crew. They were in constant contact with me and the job was finished quickly and professionally. I would easily want to work with them again. Give them a call!

name: Emily W. Plumlee
text: Thompson did a great job repairing our chimney. They even came back afterwards to check and verify it was water tight before a rainstorm. Always quick to respond when I reached out with a question.

name: Colin Pollard
text: I had a great experience with Thompson: they were timely, courteous, efficient, and clean.  The crew led by Pedro that put the roof on took one day to strip the old and put on the new; really fast team!  they cleaned up afterwards, too, which was excellent.  Thompson then came out, checked the work, and fixed the gutter guards that needed minor adjustment (free of charge).  For my first experience getting a new roof, I have to say I am very happy.

name: Mike Blocker
text:
Thompson coordinated the removal of a rock chimney, the removal of old felt and roofing shingle and the replacement with new on the  house and garage, replacement of all windows with Dura Pro energy efficient windows, removal of all Masonite siding from the house and garage and replacement with vinyl siding, replacement of two house doors and one garage door, and the  installation of leafless gutters.

Four  different sub contractors were involved - chimney removers, roofers, dry wall specialists, and carpentry/siding experts.  With no exception, each subcontractor was staffed with very skilled people who worked hard and efficiently from the time they arrived until quitting time.

My wife and I are extremely pleased with the final product.  We think our 40 year-old house now looks as if it were just built.  The work started the day Thompson said and the job finished on time.  The site manager was very responsive to our needs and very easy to contact and talk to.

I would definitely use Thompson Roofing and Construction again.

name: Aaron Anderson
text: Great service. Had a roof replaced back in 2013-14 and also one here in 2020. From start to finish A++ service.

name: Bama Dogman
text: Outstanding job, and I was also very satisfied with the subcontractor they used for a major portion of it.  Not being in the business, I relied on their expertise to pick the right sub, and I wasn’t disappointed.  I am always concerned about Workers Comp insurance, and Thompson covered everything in writing for me.  I had some bidders who admitted they don’t carry it.  Thompson was not the lowest bid; maybe that’s part of the reason that they did such a great job.  Also, what they estimated is exactly what I paid, no extras or surprises.  Special thanks to Jeremy and Kyle for working to meet our tight schedule.

name: Adrian Gimenez
text: Very professional and courteous overall. They responded to all my calls/emails promptly and showed up to all scheduled appointments on time. Roof was replaced within two days after start and everything was cleaned up very well afterwards. Would highly recommended as a contractor !

name: Jeff Archer
text: We had a great experience with Thompson Roofing. Adam Lee did a great job explaining our options after hail damage. Keith got right on the scheduling. Jeremy Burns was on top of the instillation process. Angel lead the team of installers. The work was professional, the clean up was thorough and the followup was courteous. We really appreciated Jeremy and Adam doing a followup inspection before we cut them a check. It's good to work with a company you can trust.

name: Therise Benford
text: I had a leak in my garage caused from the roof. Called several roofing companies, Thompson was the only place that agreed to come out that day and at least put a temporary fix because it was due to rain that night. They came back in reasonable time and permanently corrected the issue at a reasonable cost. Will definitely use their services again.

name: Michael St.Peter
text: Great experience all around. Quality work, and the customer service was outstanding.  Will use them again for any roofing needs I have.

name: Margie at the Beach
text: Beautiful roof! I interviewed five local roofing companies and Thompson was our final choice. They impressed me right from the start when the sales person came to the interview with his GoPro video of the top of my roof, zooming in on all the trouble spots their bid would cover the repair of. He did the same when the new roof was completed. Very professional. And, the actual roofers were tidy and very friendly.

name: A Todd Baker
text: Thompson Roofing and Construction was absolutely professional. We appreciate the GoPro video Kyle made while inspecting my roof to show us exactly what was wrong and the work that needed to be done. Everything was straight forward easy to understand, organized and put on paper. Communication was excellent. We highly recommend this company! This was not our first or second roofing experience but by far the very very best! OUTSTANDING WORK!!!

name: Latoya Adams
text: The employees at the company were very professional and kind.  They took the time to ensure that any concerns that I had were addressed and explained any delays in scheduling.  The only reason they've received a 4 instead of a 5 was due to some unfortunate issues with scheduling but otherwise they were a pleasure to work with.  Quality of the work performed were their main concern which I genuinely appreciated.  Great team!!

name: Mark Rocks
text: Adam Lee did a fantastic job giving me many different options along with education on the different options to choose from and I never felt pressured at all. He and the Program Manager Keith kept me informed at all times. The roofing crew did an amazing job and cleaned up after themselves. Great experience all around! Definitely have recommended Thompson to others

name: Michael Clayton
text: Workers were easy toward with.  They were professional and efficient and friendly. In the past we have never had any complaints with work done.  Very impressed with all the work done by Thompson Roofing and Construction.  Would recommend them to anyone without reservations of any kind.

name: Nancy Picogna
text: From Kyle first coming out to all the people who worked on our enormous project to Kyle coming back to wind things up, this was a top-notch experience. Their work ethic is THE BEST (hard to find these days!) and Keith was great about always staying in touch about what was happening, when they were going to be arriving to work, etc. Could not have asked for a better experience. Thanks, Thompson Roofing!

name: Dave Hargrave
text: Installers did a great job and were pleasant when I wanted to switch up the ends of the gutters.  Work was done well and looks great!

name: James Sewald
text: They gave me  a bid on a roof and gutters. They were very good, on time and did a very nice job. Would use again.

name: David Dunaway
text: They showed up exactly when they said they would and got finished when they said they would. Even did a great job of cleaning up. Very professional. Will always highly recommend Thompson Roofing.

name: D S
text: Excellent service from the time they provided the estimate to well after the re-roof. The service after installation was equally as impressive. We received  a follow up call to check on our satisfaction and inform us that the warranty paperwork had been completed with the manufacturer. All around very professional operation and a great experience!

name: Pat Kelly
text: We are very happy with the roofing work. The employees covered every possible problem on the roof.  The job was very clean. Confidence came with the  first contact where we asked for an estimate and continued to the end. Scott answered every question and kept us updated on each step in the process.

name: Melanie Winland
text: I wish there was a no star option. 2 months of trying to get my roof repaired, after multiple revisits and the leak hasn't even slowed down! Now I'm having a different company come out to do the work that should have been done in the first place. I wouldn't recommend this company to anyone.

name: Wesley Viall
text: Great company to work with. Ask for Marcus Sanders and he will not steer you wrong. Thompson roofing has been great to work with and they replaced my roof in one day.

name: Wade Pettus
text: From start to finish, my experience with Thompson Roofing & Construction was outstanding. Communication throughout the entire process was excellent and the workmanship is top notch. I've already recommended this company to several folks and if I ever have any roofing needs in the future these guys will definitely be the first ones I call.

name: Carmen Williamson
text: the gentleman Caleab that came out to check my roof was very nice and polite. He was very informational on the process of what needs to be done with my roof. I rated this review at 4 because the young man was suppose to contact me with an estimate of my roof with 24-48 hours and its been a week now and no contact.

name: Mike Alexander
text: I contacted Thompson Roofing after noticing a leak in my roof that was starting to damage the sheetrock ceiling of an upstairs bedroom.  I went outside and saw what appeared to be a couple shingles missing.  I searched for contractors and was impressed by the reviews Thompson Roofing had received.  I put in a request for contact.  Thompson Roofing was professional from start to finish!  Scott came out to inspect the area and provide the estimate.  He did a thorough inspection including providing pictures and video so I could see the issue 1st hand.  It was quite a bit more serious than a couple shingles missing.  He also patched the roof so it would not leak anymore!  He followed up with a detailed estimate spelling out exactly what they would be doing!  I accepted the estimate and a few days later two great young men - Sammy and Jamie - came out and took care of the job!  From what I could see they did an excellent job  I figured I would receive the bill and pay, and I would be happy with that.  It was much better than that.  I received a follow-up call to see if I was satisfied.  On top of that Scott called and scheduled a walkthrough.  He came out, climbed back up on the roof and took pictures of the final job and provided them to me so I could inspect the job.  Working with Thompson roofing was a great experience!

name: Amir
text: These guys are the upmost professionals!  Outstanding attitude and second to none crew... Your hard earned money will be well spent with these guys. Thank you for taking such good care of our home 🙏🏽

name: Mary Fuller
text: The staff was prompt and. professional. The job was completed  ahead of time and Adam Lee was great at explaining the process of repairing the damage and the financial side as well. I am completely satisfied with my repairs to my roof and garage.

name: Donna Russell
text: Removed  fireplace  chimney ,  repaired  the roof  to stop leaks .

resp.text: Got a great review on that work, sending a thank you back. Hoping that you are happy dry and enjoy that leak free fix for many years to come.

name: Rick Hays
text: I am very happy with the whole experience with Thompson Roofing. They were on time with all appointments and did an extremely good job with the reroof. I highly recommend them.

name: Daniel Walter
text: The best roofer in north al

resp.text: As a family-owned local business, we sure do appreciate that review more than you know. It's customers like you that help keep us driven. God Bless

name: Warren Schoenknecht
text:
Scott was very professional and friendly, he did a complete investigation of my roof problems. he explained what the problems were and what had to be done to correct them. He provided me with a complete estimate to perform the repairs. I agreed with the estimate and we scheduled a day to perform them.  The repair crew did a very neat professional repair on my roof, we have had two heavy rains since the repairs were completed and there were no leaks
GREAT JOB!

name: Denice Kirby
text: Thompson Roofing repaired our roof just in time before all the rain came.  We love working with Thompson Roofing because they show up on the job and do quality work.  Thank you Thompson Roofing!

name: Kevin Redmond
text: Despite some delays in our small project due to some understandable personal issues, the team at Thompson was very professional and communicative.  They were easy to get in touch with, always called back when they said they would, and they did a great job with our repairs.  Will definitely use them again in the future for pretty much any construction project they can help with.  They'll be our first stop!

name: Kaz Watanabe
text: Great customer service.  Very attentive and on top of things.  Highly recommend.

name: Brian
text: Finally finding a great roofing company after dealing with a bunch of duds over the past couple years can really do a lot for your stress level, wish I would have gone with them for my workshop.  This experience started with Kyle coming by and going over all the options, the measurements and pre-inspection (satellite and drone based respectively, cool stuff).  We settled on what we wanted and got on the schedule.  The materials were delivered a day before and I noticed that the supply company sent the wrong decking (I asked to special order a specific type), Kyle and the job foreman, Keith, came out first thing the next morning and swapped out the decking in their own trucks before the roofers even needed to start using it.  Finally, after it was all done Kyle came back for a post inspection. He found some corners in these uncommonly-designed window wells I have that needed a bit more flashing to make sure water would never get in there again.  He sent out his repair guy Jamie, who knocked 5 windows out in 2 hours.  I am so happy with my roof.

name: James Gates
text: I needed a new roof on a shared-townhome in Madison, AL. Thompson Roofing and Construction were professionals, honest, reliable, and affordable. They were able to do the project on my timeline, and the communication I received while working with them was top-notch. I will absolutely be working with them in the future, and recommend them without hesitation.

name: Clinton Herbert
text:
I am pleased with the work and professionalism I recieved from Thompson Roofing.

Unlike any other roofing business in Devatur or nearby, this company actually has a website to inform us of the work they do. That was my main reason for choosing this company for my roof leak. The process of getting an inspection to work completion was effortless. I will further do business with this company if I ever have roofing issues in the future.

name: Hoyt Jones
text: Sales Rep (Scott Shaw)went over and above to make sure my family was taken care of. Especially nice as we were a small job that many wouldn't even give us an estimate on our emergency repair. Now  we are planning on doing the entire roof and will be calling Thompson.

name: Terri Garlen
text: Excellent folks to work with. Would recommend them for any job.

name: Seyed Sadeghi
text: We have a very good experience with Thompson Roofing and Construction. They are prompt, professional, and on time. We are happy with our new roof and the quality of the work. We recommend them strongly.

name: R Henson
text: Great company to do business with.  Very honest and do what they say they will do.  Highly recommend to anyone.

name: Rick Austin
text: Thompson Roofing & Construction did and excellent job of reroofing and vinyl siding our entire home, garage, and shed!  Also, they did a great job of replacing screen, hanging new shutters, and exterior painting.  It was a very pleasant experience working with Kyle, Keith, and Jeremy.  If and when I need work done in the future  I will certainly think of them first!

name: Anita Dillaha
text: This company did an excellent job on my roof.  Arrived on time and cleaned up very well.  Scott Shaw was very professional and explained everything to me.

name: Robert Scites
text: I'm well pleased with every aspect of my interaction with Thompson Roofing and Construction. Their communication was excellent, pricing fair, and my repair seems to be of good quality.

name: Gordon Wilkerson
text: Thompson Roofing did a great job replacing our 3 leaking skylights.there was a lot of unseen damage to the roof decking that hey also took care of. I was pleased they took the extra time to repair all damage. I would recommend Thompson Roofing to anybody in need of a roofing repair.

name: Bobby Graham
text: From beginning to end our experience with these people has been superb for a business. Adam Lee has been special, and the workers were dedicated to doing good work. I doubt that you’ll find this kind of operation very much.

name: Chuck Lindstrom
text: Marcus and the staff were great to work with.  Could not even tell that they had been there when I got home from work.  Would highly recommend Thompson roofing.

name: Will Harmond
text: Thompson roofing was the obvious choice for our family. Customer service was over the top, the care and concern for our home was refreshing, and the multiple options of coverage and design made our difficult decisions much easier. We can't thank Kyle O'Toole, our customer service representative, enough for assisting us every step of the way, and making Thompson Roofing the best experience for us before, during, and after our roofing experience.

name: Sharon Tate
text:
Great Job and it looks wonderful!

Thank you!

name: Austin Graner
text: Thompson Roofing did a great job on my roof and completed the job in just over a day.

name: Travis Key
text: Thompson Roofing met my needs in roof repair. From the initial contact from Marcus Sanders, all the way to roof completion, Thompson Roofing made sure everything was done in a timely manner.

name: Lori Kamus
text: Very thorough inspection (with photos), 30 year workmanship warranty, and a great crew with supervisors providing progress updates are among the reasons I’m impressed with their quality service and superior professionalism — great products, and even better people!

name: Kenny Cagle
text: Definitely would use again, but don't think we will need to after the excellent job! Adam is the best for sure!!!

name: Jessica Weber
text: Very personable and accommodating!  We had a very frustrating leak that kept coming back and Thompson Roofing was very persistent! Leak is fixed and they replaced our attic fans! Amazing people and very reasonably priced! We are a forever customer!

name: Deborah Smith
text: The level of professionalism was excellent! Really answered all my questions and were quick to get the job done in a timely manner! Just AWESOME!

name: Sharon Williams
text: Professional, courteous, and excellent work.  Very satisfied!

name: Nicole Farmer-Landry
text: They did a fantastic job repairing our roof and dormer windows! They were also very professional, organized and communicated with us from beginning estimate to closing invoice.

name: Burley Garrison
text: was very helpful through the whole process. Did not pay anything until both Thompson rep Kyle and I both was happy with the final results. I hope to work with them again in the future.

name: Fli Mi
text:
Owner says they do business in my area....estimator comes out...calls me today stuttering for words and says project manager doesn't want to come this far. Bunch of BS! Someone doesn't know what they are doing...glad I DID NOT USE THEM since honesty is NOT there strong point!
Well to your reply..
You tell me one thing, state another, renig on the end result=TELLING ME ON THE PHONE (RECORDED)ITS TOO FAR AND THIS REPLY  TELLING ME SOMETHING ELSE! Would not recommend you to ANYONE...DONT LIKE LIES!

resp.text:
Dear Fly Y,
Our business model is to be up front with all our customers and always take the time to explain the work, our process and provide detailed estimates of scope and cost. We have great relationships with our clients, indeed much of our business comes from referrals and past customers. In your case, we did not believe we could satisfy you so we thought it best to decline the work.

name: Mark Stone
text: Replaced 20 year chimney cap and flashing and rust stained chimney siding at a fair price.   Good work,

name: Doris Boston
text: They did an excellent job replacing my roof after hail damage. They were very professional. I would highly recommend this company.

name: Jon Wooten
text: Love my new roof!  Thompson Roofing and Construction did an awesome job. You couldn't ask for a better company.

name: Karen Morris
text: Very easy to work, dependable and did a great job.

name: Helen Massey
text: Pleased with job. Very professional.

name: Adam Christiansen
text: Came out quickly and did a thorough job!

name: Jeff Meyer
text: I had a storm repair which damaged about 6 shingles and some siding on a chimney. They repaired the shingles and cleaned up on Easter Sunday, after missing Saturday repair because of rain.  They we're a little pricey @ 600 dollars for about an hours work.

name: Lewis Lemon
text:
Thompson Roofing did an excellent job replacing my roof after some spring hail damage to my roof. They did a very good cleanup job.
The workers arrived on time each dat (two days) and did not leave a mess between the two days.

name: Russell Sage
text: This was a small repair to replace some shingles that were ripped off by high winds.  The repairs were were completed promptly by skilled professionals.  I recommend Thompson roofing and construction.

name: sheralyn goins
text: They did an excellent job with my roof and replacing my rotted trim! I couldn't be happier! Everything looks amazing!!

name: Trent Heard
text: After a severe hail storm came thru wreaking havoc upon our community, Thompson Roofing was there to take care of things and see that the job was done right with not only the roof but with our other damaged property as well. Start to Finish this was a great company to do business with!

name: Paula Stone
text: Everyone that I dealt with  were friendly and very professional. Excellent workmanship.

name: Eric Lumpkin
text: TR&C did a great job of installing pipe boots. Its been a couple of months and there are no visible leaks inside. Communications is an area for improvement.

name: Laura Gummel
text: They did 2 roof repairs. Free estimate and prompt professional service. Site was cleaned and Adam was a pleasure to work with. Will call them for any future roofing needs.

name: Joseph Jones
text: The staff is awesome and does whatever it takes to make the customer happy!

name: Jeffery Klein
text: Glad for the trouble shoot and quick repair for my roof

name: Brenda Gray
text: Thompson Roofing personnel did a excellent job re-roofing my house.

name: Carly Lee
text: Great team of people to be associated with!

name: Robert Cook
text: Great Communication, On Time, Great Job

name: Jon Freund
text: They did great work building me a deck. I had them do some painting in a couple of rooms as well and they did fantastic work. They are reasonably priced and very professional. I will continue to use them and highly recommend M & J Handymen.

name: Curtis Lewis
text: I had a less then 4x8 area of damage on my roof.  2 hrs was the max or would take to repair but they quoted me a day and a half. I  worked at home improvement centers for several years and knew their cost was ridiculous.

name: Theodore Chandler
text:
Fails to deliver. Possibility of being ghosted.

TLDR:
Request patch on back porch to prevent further floor joist damage
Company patches hole but it fails to seal against water leaks
Request company come back to fix patch
Company fails to deliver. Instead stops all contact with customer.

I accepted a proposal to repair a leak on my back porch and fix a floor joist which had been rotting due to the leak.
Work took place on February 20th while I was out of town. The floor joist was successfully repaired. Unfortunately when I got back and poured some water over the patch I found that it still allowed water onto the support.
I contacted the business owner (Devin Lanier) on February 25 by text message and by email on February 27th.
The business owner replied via email the next day stating "So sorry about that. Let me look at our schedule and I will get someone back out there to check it out ASAP".
The company scheduled an appointment for Sunday March 3rd to look at the leak. A storm came through the area on the day they were scheduled and I understand it would not have been possible for them to come out. Unfortunately no cancellation notice was communicated to me.
I reached back out by email on March 4th to ask again for someone to check on the leak and I was told "Yes a few of my guys were caught up up with the weather. Let me look at our schedule this week and try to get someone to cut loose and head over there. I’ll let you know. "

Since the email on the March 4th I have not received any contact from the company. I have tried many avenues of contact without success.
Including emails on March 9th, March 14th, March 18th and March 28th.
Phone calls to both the main number requesting call backs and the estimator number. None of which have been returned

name: Angela
text: Steve has been so helpful to me and my film crew. I recommend this company.

name: Ashley Bonner

He does nothing halfway and values your input too, instead of overriding your ideas. I have gotten to know Jordan a lot during this process, and he is not only a fabulous contractor, but a man of great heart and compassion. He understands people as well as he does home remodeling and does not skimp on either. I cannot reccomend him enough. YOU WILL NEVER NEED ANOTHER CONTRACTOR AGAIN.
